recipe.title: Double Chocolate Edible “Cookie Dough” Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Soak cashews in boiling water for two hours.
Drain the cashews and blend in a food processor for 30 seconds. Pour in coconut oil and agave, and chocolate, and continue to blend for 1 minute.
Scrape down sides and add in almond flour. Blend until smooth, approximately 2-5 minutes.
Remove from food processor and transfer to a food storage container and stir in chocolate chips.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

Scrape down sides and add in almond flour.
